name: Investments of foreign, alien insurers
text:
PART V.  INVESTMENT OF FOREIGN AND ALIEN INSURERS

 §431:6-501    The investments of a foreign or alien insurer shall be as permitted by the laws of its domicile, but shall be of a quality substantially as high as those required by this article for similar funds of like domestic insurers. [L 1987, c 347, pt of §2]
